headerDisplay: For help and support please visit our GitHub Wiki. We hope you find this plugin useful!

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the log.

disableDiscovery.title: Disable Device Discovery
disableDiscovery.description: If checked, device auto-discovery will be skipped.

discoveryInterval.title: Discovery Interval
discoveryInterval.description: An interval (in seconds) in which the plugin will attempt to discover new devices on your local network.

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: If checked, device updates will not be added to the log.

disablePlugin.title: Disable Device Logging
disablePlugin.description: If checked, the plugin will remove all accessories and not load the plugin on restart.

noMotionTimer.title: No Motion Timer
noMotionTimer.description: A timer (in seconds) for how long after motion is not detected that the state is changed.

doorOpenTimer.title: Door Open/Close Timer
doorOpenTimer.description: Applies only to Wemo Maker in Garage Door mode. The time in seconds for how long it takes the garage door to open/close.

ignoredDevices.title: Ignored Devices
ignoredDevices.description: You can use this setting to ignore (and remove) devices.

items.title: Serial Number
items.description: The serial number of the device that should be ignored.

manualDevices.title: Manual Devices
manualDevices.description: You can use this setting to manually configure devices.

makerTypes.title: Sensors
makerTypes.description: You can define how your Wemo Maker is shown.

serialNumber.title: Maker Serial Number
serialNumber.description: Serial number of the Wemo Maker, normally in the format 2*************.

makerType.title: Maker Type
makerType.description: How this Wemo Maker should appear.

makerTimer.title: Maker Timer
makerTimer.description: The time in seconds for how long it takes the garage door to open/close.

layout.title: Optional Settings
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for general use of this plugin.

items.helpvalue: Please see the wiki to manually configure this.
